description:
You’ll have no worries getting changed in the rain with this poncho. With its plush cotton interior, DWR coated outer shell and kangaroo pocket, this’ll be an easy choice when packing for a surfing trip or days at your favourite swimming hole.

  • DWR coated waterproof outer shell, with a soft terry cotton on the inside makes for a cozy changing room
  • The internal and external access Kangaroo pocket keeps your hands toasty while changing or keeping warm in the elements
  • Double layer woven hood with drawcords keep your heat locked in after that mid hike dip
  • OEKO-TEX® 100 certified fabric has been tested for harmful substances, to give you confidence that what is next to your skin has been made with the utmost care
name: Slowtide All-Weather Poncho - Unisex
